DataElement.preferredName: Other Pain Or Anti-inflammatory Medication Administration Twice Weekly Month or more Frequency Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Other pain or anti-inflammatory medication twice weekly for a month or more

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Other Pain Or Anti-inflammatory Medication Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the current administration of pain medication._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Having to do with reducing inflammation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Having to do with reducing inflammation.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Having to do with reducing inflammation.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Twice Weekly Month or more Frequency Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Two times per week._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Twice Weekly Greater Than or Equal To Month Frequency Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Two times per week.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI):An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/22/14 CDE released; VD released per Christine Rodgers. jc    1/11/13 created for UAMS cmr

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you ever taken any other
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever taken any other pain or anti-inflammatory medication at least twice a week for one month or more?
